BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
Location: HYBRID HEARING - Council Chambers - City Hall

Items.Title: Communication from the Comptroller - Submitting the name of Georgia Pestana to the Council for its advice and consent concerning her appointment to the New York City Conflicts of Interest Board, pursuant to Section 2602 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Georgia Pestana, Conflicts of Interest Board

Items.Title: Communication from the Public Advocate - Submitting the name of Ifeoma Ike, Esq. to the Council for its advice and consent concerning her appointment to the New York City Conflicts of Interest Board, pursuant to Section 2602 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Ifeoma Ike, Esq., Conflicts of Interest Board

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Yeger, Restler, Williams and Public Advocate Williams
